fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to reveal at night.
- Alternatively, choose two players to swap roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Targets will retain their faction and goal, everything else is swapped.
- Each player can only have their role swapped by you once.
- Lost charges are replenished.
- If either target has at least Powerful Defense, your swap will fail and your target is informed.
- Once all Good-Aligned roles are dead, you will leave town.
- **Ethereal Defense**: Your defense only applies to Evil and Neutral factions. Good faction roles ignore your defense, unless you gain defense by other means.
